name: Sokobanana
description:
V2: Fixed unintended solutions on level 3C and 4B. Thanks to Melany for pointing these out! Also added some extra animations and sounds for clarity.

Arrow keys/WASD to move. [Z] to undo. [R] to restart.

I love making silly Sokoban variations. Two years ago I crossed it over with Picross/Nonogram. And last year I finished adapting the gameplay to a three-dimensional grid. Now I made a funny block transportation game about sliding over banana peels!

This one should be easier and a bit shorter that my usual puzzle games. Good luck!

Play on Puzzlescript.net - Hack this game
